txt.en: Duillam can be found in the Blue Theatre in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nYou have done your best to direct the members of the Cloudyheads to the stage of the Blue Theatre. You should talk to Duillam.
'I'll have you know that Gord Dunley is never late for a show!'
'Backstage? Why, that could be anywhere in here!'

During Midsummer, many revellers gather in the Blue Theatre of Minas Tirith to attend plays and musical performances.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Thank you! This theatre is quite a bit larger than I remember it!'
'Oh, I see. It's that way, is it?'

'Once again, I must apologize for the delay.

'What delay, you ask? Are you not here for the Cloudyheads? It is a dreadful name, I think, but they are fine enough musicians. They're scheduled to play soon, but I've no idea where they've gone. They haven't left the theatre, but that is all I know.

'Would you find them for me and direct them backstage?'
Talk to Duillam
Direct the Cloudyheads to meet backstage in the Blue Theatre ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The members of the Cloudyheads can be found throughout the Blue Theatre in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nDuillam has asked you to find and direct the members of the Cloudyheads to the stage in the Blue Theatre.
'Goodness me, I must have lost track of time!'
'It's time already? The show must go on!'
'I am backstage, yes?'
'I am quite ready. You need not worry about me.'
Direct the Cloudyheads to meet backstage in the Blue Theatre ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'It seems that you may be the one who is lost, friend.'
'Oh, thank you!\n\n'I should have known better than to invite them to perform in the Blue Theatre again. Much less for all of Midsummer!'
'Ha! What dwarf would get lost in such a place?'
'I was just getting a sense for the acoustics!'
Something Misplaced, Something Blue
'I'm wanted backstage? Very well.'
